con:request.name: Insert New Firm 1

<!--Optional:--> <for:Username>${#Project#Username}</for:Username> <!--Optional:--> <for:Password>${#Project#Password}</for:Password> </for:AuthHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <for:InsertFirm> <!--Optional:--> <for:firmData><![CDATA[<MarsFirmDataSet xmlns="http://tempuri.org/MarsFirm.xsd"> <FIRM> <EXTERNAL_FIRM_ID /> <FIRM_COMMENT /> <FIRM_NAME>${Properties#FrmName}</FIRM_NAME> <FIRM_NAME_CAPS>${Properties#FrmName}</FIRM_NAME_CAPS> <SHORT_NAME>NF</SHORT_NAME> <SHORT_NAME_CAPS>NF</SHORT_NAME_CAPS> <ENTRY_USER>${#Project#Username}</ENTRY_USER> <UPDATE_DATE>${#Project#EntryDate}</UPDATE_DATE> <UPDATE_USER>${#Project#Username}</UPDATE_USER> <KEY_ACCT_TERR /> <NSCC_FIRM_NBR /> <SDR_FLG /> <CALL_CD>1</CALL_CD> <MAIL_CD>1</MAIL_CD> <EMAIL_CD>1</EMAIL_CD> <CRD_ID /> <PRIM_PHONE>1234567</PRIM_PHONE> <PRIM_PHONE_EXT /> <PRIM_FAX /> <EXTERNAL_ID /> <CONFIRM_YN>Y</CONFIRM_YN> <REP_TERR_BASED_ON>R</REP_TERR_BASED_ON> <OFFICE_NM>${Properties#OffName}</OFFICE_NM> <ADDRESS1>Hyd</ADDRESS1> <ADDRESS2 /> <ADDRESS3 /> <ADDRESS4 /> <CITY>General Electric</CITY> <STATE_ID>NY</STATE_ID> <ZIP>12345</ZIP> <COUNTRY_CD>US</COUNTRY_CD> </FIRM> </MarsFirmDataSet>]]></for:firmData> <!--Optional:--> <for:officeData><![CDATA[<MarsOfficeDataSet xmlns="http://tempuri.org/MarsOffice.xsd"> <OFFICE> <EXTERNAL_OFFICE_ID /> <EXTERNAL_FIRM_ID /> <OFFICE_NM>${Properties#HomeOff}</OFFICE_NM> <OFFICE_NM_CAPS>NF OFF</OFFICE_NM_CAPS> <ENTRY_USR>${#Project#UpdatedUser}</ENTRY_USR> <UPDATE_DATE>${#Project#EntryDate}</UPDATE_DATE> <UPDATE_USR>${#Project#Username}</UPDATE_USR> <OFFICE_MANAGER_ID /> <NUMBER_OF_REPS /> <TIMEZONE /> <LAST_MEETING_DATE /> <OFFICE_COMMENT /> <STATUS_UPDATE_DATE>${#Project#EntryDate}</STATUS_UPDATE_DATE> <NEW_OFFICE_FIRM_TYPE /> <WEB_SITE /> <HOME_OFF_FLAG>Y</HOME_OFF_FLAG> <CALL_CD>1</CALL_CD> <CALL_CD_OVERRIDE_FLG /> <MAIL_CD>1</MAIL_CD> <MAIL_CD_OVERRIDE_FLG /> <EMAIL_CD>1</EMAIL_CD> <EMAIL_CD_OVERRIDE_FLG /> <LATITUDE>42.81424320</LATITUDE> <LONGITUDE>-73.93956870</LONGITUDE> con:config.con:query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM MS_INTEGRATION_DATA_STORE WHERE ENTITY_NAME='MS_SALES' ORDER BY UPD_DT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
